thread.title: Huge drugs catapult found on Mexico border with US
thread.title_full: Huge drugs catapult found on Mexico border with US

author: Barney Henderson
title: Huge drugs catapult found on Mexico border with US
text:
A huge, medieval-style, catapult designed to launch drugs over the Mexico-US border has been found by officials.
The contraption was discovered by US border patrol agents on the Mexican side of the border, southeast of Tucson, Arizona.
The catapult is removed by officials A s the officers approached the border fence, a group of men ran off. They discovered the device attached to the fence and found two bundles of cannabis weighing a total of 47lb (21kg) next to the catapult.
No arrests were made and the catapult was removed.
The border, which President Donald Trump wants to reinforce with a "wall", is 1,100 miles long. Around half of it already has a fence or wall in place.
Current US-Mexico border I n September, a modified van was found equipped with an air-powered cannon designed to shoot drugs packages over the border. The 10-feet metal tube was described as a “homemade bazooka”.
Drugs tunnels under the border are also regularly found.
I n October last year, Mexican prosecutors found a tunnel equipped with ventilation and lighting that headed from the city of Tijuana toward the US.
Watch | Longest ever drug tunnel found on Mexico-California border 01:28
